title: Why Partner With Whiteboard Consultants?
description: As Kolkata's leading education consultants, we are committed to providing personalized, expert guidance to help you achieve your academic and career ambitions.

features.text: Experienced counselors with deep industry knowledge.
Personalized guidance tailored to your unique profile.
Comprehensive support for both study abroad and domestic admissions.
High success rate in test preparation and visa applications.
End-to-end support from initial counseling to pre-departure.
Official partners with top universities like UOW India

image.alt: A dedicated team of education consultants collaborating
